#summary Instructions for installing pyftpdlib (for those really new to Python).
#labels SortOrder-3

= Requirements =

Python 2.3 or higher (not Python 3.x). You can get the latest 2.x stable Python release from here: [http://www.python.org/download/ http://www.python.org/download/].

= Using easy_install / setuptools =

If you have [http://pypi.python.org/pypi/setuptools easy_install / setuptools] on your system, installing pyftpdlib is quite simple. Just run:
{{{
easy_install pyftpdlib
}}}
This will get the most updated pyftpdlib from the Python [http://pypi.python.org/pypi pypi repository], unpack it and install it automatically.

Note: if you already have an old version of pyftpdlib installed, easy_install
will not automatically download the latest version. You can ask for a particular version by running, for example:
{{{
easy_install.py pyftpdlib==0.3.0
}}}

= Manual installation =

If you have downloaded a pyftpdlib package, follow the following steps:

Unpack it (Windows users could use 7Zip, WinRar or other similar program):
{{{
tar zxvf pyftpdlib-0.3.0.tar.gz
}}}

Change to the pyftpdlib directory:
{{{
cd pyftpdlib
}}}

Run setup.py to install pyftpdlib. This step need to be run as root.
{{{
python setup.py install
}}}

If you're on Windows just run:
{{{
setup.py install
}}}
